page.title: 19EDUCATION:SPECIAL FACILITIES
page.content: {THE CHANTRY CENTRE}offers a wide range of facilities for education in one building. Part of it is a primary school.{The Music Centre}organises 19 peripetetic teachers to teach 600 children in schools in Gravesham. There is orchestra practice on Thursday evening and Saturday morning. {The Maths Centre}is for in-service training of teachers during term time and acts as a valuable resource bank of materials and books.{The Remedial {Advisory Centre}takes children with learning difficulties in language. {The Multicultural Centre}is a recently established unit which provides resources to assist teachers and children to live harmoniously in a multicultural society. {NATIONAL SEA TRAINING COLLEGE}at{ {DENTON,}prepares youths for merchant duty.
